text: <!channel>:  Hey ladies of uncorked! I'm putting together a casual happy hour for awesome women across industries (think Bcc for girls).  It starts at 5pm tomorrow at Trader Vics. If you're free, I'd love to see ya'll there, if not - no worries - there will be more to come.
Awesome, that's right in my neighborhood, so I'll plan to stop by. Thanks <@U02HCCTFL>!
<@U02F8TTPU>: sweet! Would love to see you :simple_smile:
